mapper.sql: id, parent_id, name, type, permission_key, route_path, component_path, icon, sort_order, is_visible, status, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu_permission ( parent_id, name, type, permission_key, route_path, component_path, icon, sort_order, is_visible, status, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{parentId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{permissionKey}, #{routePath}, #{componentPath}, #{icon}, #{sortOrder}, #{isVisible}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE menu_permission SET parent_id = #{parentId}, name = #{name}, type = #{type}, permission_key = #{permissionKey}, route_path = #{routePath}, component_path = #{componentPath}, icon = #{icon}, sort_order = #{sortOrder}, is_visible = #{isVisible}, status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}

mapper.select: SELECT FROM menu_permission ORDER BY sort_order ASC, create_time DESC
SELECT FROM menu_permission WHERE parent_id IS NULL ORDER BY sort_order ASC
SELECT FROM menu_permission WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY sort_order ASC

SELECT mp.id, mp.parent_id, mp.name, mp.type, mp.permission_key, mp.route_path, mp.component_path, mp.icon, mp.sort_order, mp.is_visible, mp.status, mp.create_time, mp.update_time FROM menu_permission mp INNER JOIN role_permission rp ON mp.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY mp.sort_order ASC

SELECT DISTINCT mp.id, mp.parent_id, mp.name, mp.type, mp.permission_key, mp.route_path, mp.component_path, mp.icon, mp.sort_order, mp.is_visible, mp.status, mp.create_time, mp.update_time FROM menu_permission mp INNER JOIN role_permission rp ON mp.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND mp.status = true ORDER BY mp.sort_order ASC
SELECT FROM menu_permission WHERE type = 'MENU' AND status = true ORDER BY sort_order ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM menu_permission WHERE permission_key = #{permissionKey}
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM menu_permission WHERE permission_key = #{permissionKey} AND id != #{excludeId}
